verses.verse: Then Jonah<WH3124> prayed<WH6419> unto the LORD<WH3068> his God<WH430> out of the fish's<WH1710> belly<WH4578>,

And said<WH559>, I cried<WH7121> by reason of mine affliction<WH6869> unto the LORD<WH3068>, and he heard<WH6030> me; out of the belly<WH990> of hell<WH7585> cried<WH7768> I, and thou heardest<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>. by: or, out of mine affliction hell: or, the grave

For thou hadst cast<WH7993> me into the deep<WH4688>, in the midst<WH3824> of the seas<WH3220>; and the floods<WH5104> compassed<WH5437> me about: all thy billows<WH4867> and thy waves<WH1530> passed over<WH5674> me. midst: Heb. heart
Then I said<WH559>, I am cast out<WH1644> of thy sight<WH5869>; yet I will look<WH5027> again<WH3254> toward thy holy<WH6944> temple<WH1964>.
The waters<WH4325> compassed me about<WH661>, even to the soul<WH5315>: the depth<WH8415> closed me round about<WH5437>, the weeds<WH5488> were wrapped about<WH2280> my head<WH7218>.

I went down<WH3381> to the bottoms<WH7095> of the mountains<WH2022>; the earth<WH776> with her bars<WH1280> was about me for ever<WH5769>: yet hast thou brought up<WH5927> my life<WH2416> from corruption<WH7845>, O LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430>. bottoms: Heb. cuttings off corruption: or, the pit
When my soul<WH5315> fainted<WH5848> within me I remembered<WH2142> the LORD<WH3068>: and my prayer<WH8605> came in<WH935> unto thee, into thine holy<WH6944> temple<WH1964>.
They that observe<WH8104> lying<WH7723> vanities<WH1892> forsake<WH5800> their own mercy<WH2617>.
But I will sacrifice<WH2076> unto thee with the voice<WH6963> of thanksgiving<WH8426>; I will pay<WH7999> that that I have vowed<WH5087>. Salvation<WH3444> is of the LORD<WH3068>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto the fish<WH1709>, and it vomited out<WH6958> Jonah<WH3124> upon the dry<WH3004> land.
